Screen turned blank and black. not working

I installed it, but it keeps repeating that there is no internet connection. I deleted the application that gives a wrong message from the first connection and does not activate, and I went back to Telegram.
Excellent aap

It's a good messenger option if you care about the account not being tied to a phone (and privacy). Using it on different devices works nicely, but the limit on the number of registered devices is annoying; I need more than a couple of devices I can use it on! On ChromeOS, I recommend using the web app and creating a shortcut that opens in its own window (much better experience than this app!).

replyText:
Hello,

We are working to include all your favourite features in the upcoming updates and you will see them appearing soon.

Many more features are on the way!

All the best,
Wire Support Team
text: Do not upgrade

replyText:
Hi,

We are sorry to hear that you're having issues with the app. We'd like to improve. Can you tell us more about what went wrong at https://support.wire.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ?

We look forward to your feedback.
Thanks,
Wire Support Team
text: App is not getting open

replyText:
Hello,

We're dedicated to improving our app with new features and enhancements. Our team is working hard to include all of your favorites in upcoming updates. Thanks for your support, and keep an eye out for these exciting new features to enhance your experience.

Best regards,
Wire Support Team
text: Last update just ruined it. make it look like the average common chat app. You CAN'T edit your texts now, wich was very useful for some typos, you CAN'T change your prof name, which was a current joke onnthe group, you CAN'T find any files now, chat has serious lag/bugs. I hope there ws a way to return to the old version until this failed update has been fixed. I can understand new versions have some bugs. Will give it a chance to see if is for better or worse.
Love it
Does not support SMS or MMS which is what I was trying to use it for. Not a replacement for Signal now that it stopped supporting those messages types
